proposal: Diving into the world of virtualization, your project seamlessly orchestrates Hypervisor, Storage, Network, and various specialized nodes, ensuring efficient VM management and secure data handling. With 1137 holders in the ETH network, you're clearly on the right track. Imagine enhancing this ecosystem with our B2B tools like a custom DEX or a blockchain-based lottery, where every community member can contribute and benefit. Let's make virtualization not just powerful but also profitable.
